wikipedia_page.main: Emma Hindle (born 19 May 1975) is a British international equestrian. She first rode for her country in 2004, competing in the World Equestrian Games of that year, and competed for Great Britain in Dressage at both the Athens and Beijing Olympic Games.

response: Her last coach was Ulla Salzgeber. She competed in Dressage for Team GB at the Beijing Olympics, stating "I am in a state of shock" upon finding out that she was selected. She was a member of the GB dressage team along with Laura Bechtolsheimer and Emma Hindle.

response: ***Grand Prix Freestyle (A-Final):  Adelinde Cornelissen  on Parzival  Carl Hester  on Uthopia  Emma Hindle  on Lancet
Hindle resided in Sale, Greater Manchester. He had a daughter, Emma Hindle, an equestrian who has competed for Great Britain in Dressage at both the Athens and Beijing Olympic Games.
